original_text: And the Lord said unto me, Cast it unto the potter: a goodly price that I was prised at of them. And I took the thirty pieces of silver, and cast them to the potter in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 그들이 나를 헤아린 바 그 삯을 토기장이에게 던지라 하시기로 내가 곧 그 은 삼십 개를 여호와의 전에서 토기장이에게 던지고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto me
A goodly price that I was prised at of them
And I took thirty pieces of silver
and cast them to the potter
in the house of the Lord
